meanings.sent1: The unsymmetrically shaped building stood out among the uniform houses on the street.
meanings.sent2: The artist intentionally painted the flowers in an unsymmetrically pattern to create visual interest.
meanings.sent3: The unsymmetrically decorated cake looked like it had been made by a clumsy baker.
meanings.sent4: Her unsymmetrically haircut made her look edgy and unique.
meanings.sent5: The unsymmetrically placed windows gave the house a quirky charm.
